headline: IBM Cloud, Now Powered by Cloudflare
description: Founded in 1911 as the Computing-Tabulating-Recording Company (CTR), IBM was renamed "International Business Machines" in 1924. 107 years later, IBM is one of 30 companies included in todayâ€™s Dow Jones Industrial Average and is one of the world's largest employers, with more than 380,000 employees.
